node.hospital_zh: 雅麗氏何妙齡那打素醫院
node.hospital_en: Alice Ho Miu Ling Nethersole Hospital
node.detail_zh: 患者有長期病患，無外遊記錄，7 月 13 日開始流鼻水，曾與 #1701 宗個案患者逗留過相同地方。
node.detail_en: The patient has underlying health conditions and no recent travel history. On July 13, he started having runny nose. He had recently stayed in the same place with patient #1701.
node.classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

node.location_en: Yung Sui House, Yung Shing Court
